amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 118-12 to amend the bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States (GAO) to submit a report to Congress on the cost of the requirements of H.R. 5 to SEAs, LEAs, and elementary and secondary schools and requires the report to also analyze and evaluate the impact of H.R. 5 on protecting parents' rights in the education of the children.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires GAO to submit a report to Congress on the cost of the requirements of H.R. 5 to SEAs, LEAs, and elementary and secondary schools and requires the GAO report to analyze and evaluate the impact of H.R. 5 on protecting parents' rights in the education of the children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 386 - 39 (Roll no. 153).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Fitzpatrick.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 386 - 39 (Roll no. 153).
